verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יִצְחָ֛ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak And Isaac אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech and blessed אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; וַיְצַוֵּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6680><s%> vay-tzav-Ve-hu him and charged וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer him and said ל֔וֹ lo, לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach unto him Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not of the daughters כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise לֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> leCh go פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה pad-De-nah אֲרָ֔ם <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram, to Padanaram בֵּ֥יתָה <S%H1004><s%> Bei-tah to the house בְתוּאֵ֖ל <S%H1328><s%> ve-tu-'El of Bethuel אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi father אִמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Me-cha; thy mother's וְקַח־ <S%H3947><s%> ve-kach- and take לְךָ֤ le-Cha מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, thee a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not from thence of the daughters לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van of Laban אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Me-cha. thy mother's

וְאֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> ve-'El And God שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai Almighty יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-Rech bless אֹֽתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha, וְיַפְרְךָ֖ <S%H6509><s%> ve-yaf-re-Cha thee and make thee fruitful וְיַרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7235><s%> ve-yar-Be-cha; and multiply וְהָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta you may become לִקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> lik-Hal thee that thou mayest be a multitude עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim. of people

וְיִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> ve-yit-ten- And give לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּרְכַּ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> bir-Kat thee the blessing אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, of Abraham לְךָ֖ le-Cha וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֣ <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'a-Cha to thee and to thy seed אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach; that לְרִשְׁתְּךָ֙ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-te-Cha with thee that thou mayest inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מְגֻרֶ֔יךָ <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-Rei-cha, wherein thou art a stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him which God לְאַבְרָהָֽם׃ <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham. unto Abraham

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent away יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak And Isaac אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה pad-De-nah אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram; to Padanaram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to לָבָ֤ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van unto Laban בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son בְּתוּאֵל֙ <S%H1328><s%> be-tu-'El of Bethuel הָֽאֲרַמִּ֔י <S%H761><s%> ha-'a-ram-Mi, the Syrian אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi the brother רִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> riv-Kah, of Rebekah אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> 'em mother יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob's וְעֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> ve-'e-Sav. and Esau's

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw עֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, When Esau כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for בֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ve-Rach had blessed יִצְחָק֮ <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak that Isaac אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַעֲקֹב֒ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob וְשִׁלַּ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-Lach and sent him away אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To פַּדֶּ֣נָֽה pad-De-nah אֲרָ֔ם <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram, to Padanaram לָקַֽחַת־ <S%H3947><s%> la-ka-chat- to take ל֥וֹ lo מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah; him a wife בְּבָרֲכ֣וֹ <S%H1288><s%> be-va-ra-Cho from thence and that as he blessed אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav him he gave him a charge עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach Thou shalt not take אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife מִבְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not of the daughters כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' obeyed יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, And that Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo; and his mother וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech gone פַּדֶּ֥נָֽה pad-De-nah אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram. to Padanaram

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar seeing עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, And Esau כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רָע֖וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot not בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not that the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei pleased יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak Isaac אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. his father

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִשְׁמָעֵ֑אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El; unto Ishmael וַיִּקַּ֡ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מָחֲלַ֣ת׀ <S%H4258><s%> ma-cha-Lat which he had Mahalath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֨אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El of Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham Abraham's אֲח֧וֹת <S%H269><s%> a-Chot the sister נְבָי֛וֹת <S%H5032><s%> ne-va-Yot of Nebajoth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- besides נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> na-Shav unto the wives ל֥וֹ lo לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to be his wife ס sa-Mek

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר mib-be-'Er שָׁ֑בַע <S%H884><s%> Sha-va'; from Beersheba וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went חָרָֽנָה׃ <S%H2771><s%> cha-Ra-nah. toward Haran

וַיִּפְגַּ֨ע <S%H6293><s%> vai-yif-Ga' And he lighted בַּמָּק֜וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom upon a certain place וַיָּ֤לֶן <S%H3885><s%> vai-Ya-len and tarried there all night שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because בָ֣א <S%H935><s%> va was set הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-She-mesh, because the sun וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and he took מֵאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> me-'av-Nei of the stones הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, of that place וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav; [them for] his pillows וַיִּשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav to sleep בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in that place הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu. He

וַֽיַּחֲלֹ֗ם <S%H2492><s%> vai-ya-cha-Lom, And he dreamed וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold סֻלָּם֙ <S%H5551><s%> sul-Lam and behold a ladder מֻצָּ֣ב <S%H5324><s%> mutz-Tzav set up אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, on the earth וְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ve-ro-Sho and the top of it מַגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> mag-Gi-a' reached הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-ye-mah; to heaven וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chei and behold the angels אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God עֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lim ascending וְיֹרְדִ֖ים <S%H3381><s%> ve-yo-re-Dim and descending בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And behold the LORD נִצָּ֣ב <S%H5324><s%> nitz-Tzav stood עָלָיו֮ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav above וַיֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar above it and said אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אַבְרָהָ֣ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha, thy father וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei and the God יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak; of Isaac הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> sho-Chev whereon thou liest עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, above לְךָ֥ le-Cha אֶתְּנֶ֖נָּה <S%H5414><s%> 'et-te-Nen-nah to thee will I give it וּלְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'E-cha. and to thy seed

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become זַרְעֲךָ֙ <S%H2233><s%> zar-'a-Cha And thy seed כַּעֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> ka-'a-Far shall be as the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the earth וּפָרַצְתָּ֛ <S%H6555><s%> u-fa-ratz-Ta and thou shalt spread abroad יָ֥מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah to the west וָקֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> va-Ke-de-mah and to the east וְצָפֹ֣נָה <S%H6828><s%> ve-tza-Fo-nah and to the north וָנֶ֑גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> va-Neg-bah; and to the south וְנִבְרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> ve-niv-ra-Chu be blessed בְךָ֛ ve-Cha כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- shall all מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot shall all the families הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah of the earth וּבְזַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2233><s%> u-ve-zar-'E-cha. and in thee and in thy seed

וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I עִמָּ֗ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, you וּשְׁמַרְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Ti-cha And behold I [am] with thee and will keep בְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- thee in all [places] whither תֵּלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech, go וַהֲשִׁ֣בֹתִ֔יךָ <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-Shi-vo-Ti-cha, and will bring thee again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah into this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; likewise כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶֽעֱזָבְךָ֔ <S%H5800><s%> 'e-'e-za-ve-Cha, for I will not leave עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher thee until אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti, I have done אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti [that] which I have spoken לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיִּיקַ֣ץ <S%H3364><s%> vai-yi-Katz awaked יַעֲקֹב֮ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מִשְּׁנָתוֹ֒ <S%H8142><s%> mish-she-na-To out of his sleep וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> 'a-Chen Surely יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> yesh is יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo did not יָדָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'e-ti. and I knew

וַיִּירָא֙ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-Ra And he was afraid וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, and said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How נּוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra How dreadful הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom [is] this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; is this אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein is none זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, This כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit this [is] none other but the house אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh and this שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar and this [is] the gate הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> vai-yash-Kem rose up early יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker, in the morning וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven the stone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- he שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> sam that he had put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֔יו <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav, [for] his pillows וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem and set it up אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah מַצֵּבָ֑ה <S%H4676><s%> matz-tze-Vah; [for] a pillar וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> vai-yi-Tzok and poured שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men oil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shah. upon the top of it
